entry.s:type: Type 01 Straight Wheels
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Type 01 Straight Wheels
Price: 49.82

[shortdesc]
  • Use when grinding with a hand-held machine
  • Best performance on a variety of materials including gray and ductile iron, stainless steels and alloys.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Premier Red
    Arbor 5/8 Inch
    Diameter 8 Inch
    Grit 140
    Height 1 Inch
    Product Type Type 01 Straight Wheels

    Product Information

  • Premium, friable, zirconia alumina grain promotes higher metal removal rates, and faster, freer-cutting than standard zirconia alumina blends
  • Up to 10X life, 50% faster grinding versus aluminum oxide wheels
  • Best choice for heavy-duty stock removal on high-horsepower grinders
  • High-strength, reinforced construction resists breakage

entry.title: Carborundum 64070 - Type 16 Cones (Round End) Aluminum Oxide A24-R 2X3X3/8-24 05539564070
entry.s:type: Type 16
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum

Price: 9.44

[shortdesc]
  • The economical choice for grinding steel or iron castings, removing burrs and flash, and finishing metal surfaces in confined areas.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Diameter 2 Inch
    Grit 24
    Height 3 Inch
    Product Type Type 16
    Thread 3/8 Inch-24

    Product Information

  • Quality, aluminum oxide abrasive provides fast stock removal
  • Resin bond for free cutting action
  • Good choice for rapid stock removal in small areas
  • Ideal for portable snagging applications such as removing flaws, cracks, gates, risers and parting lines, smoothing weld seams, cleaning castings, and rough beveling
